easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I am used to tell time or hold things; what am I?
easy.hint: Think of something that points and moves when time passes.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: The word shrinks when you add letters.

hard.q: Two siblings are born at the same moment, yet have different ages forever. How is this possible?
hard.a: They are born on different sides of the International Date Line (or time zones, or one is a baby born earlier in time).
hard.hint: Think about time zones or dates changing across places.
